resources.string: This app was made by Simon Aust. The app was created with support from the Udactiy website Android Basics Nanodegree syllabus, specifically the Android Multiscreen App course (UD839). Please contact me if you have any thoughts or advice. Thank you for using this app.

The swimming pool, sports hall and exterior scenes of the BBC television comedy series, The Brittas Empire, were filmed at Ringwood Health and Leisure Centre, at the time known as "Ringwood Recreation Centre. Ringwood also features in the new series of Channel 4's property programme Location,Location,Location in August 2016. One lady referred to Ringwood as 'The Ringwood' in a similar way Wirral in Liverpool is known as 'The Wirral'.
